title: The real buff Garen's kit needs is...
body:
The ability to unscrew his pommel. So he can end thy villians rightly!

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/uncyclopedia/images/c/cc/EndHimRightly.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150926150056

replies.body:
http://uncyclopedia.wikia.com/wiki/HowTo:End_Him_Rightly

That's a pretty funny article lol. Thanks for bringing that up. Garen should learn how to end his opponents rightly!
that is a fencing technique, give it to fiora.
It is a longsword technique. Fencing is the usage of swords, period, not Rapiers. The joke literally comes from a longsword manual and the image is of a longsword.
I watch skall, how dare you assume I don't know how to end things rightly.
YOU. I LIKE YOU. AND SKALLAGRIM.
Oh right that stupid move.  Sad I had to quit fencing before getting the chance to do it.
Ok we need a Demacian with this in his kit/quotes

END HIM RIGHTLY!

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/c9/bf/66/c9bf6675730ee69bc93fc33d48481026.jpg

Edit: Link why you no work D:

I watched a video about that a year or 2 ago... 
Let me see if I can find it... 
Took too long and lost interest, but it was a video by Skallagrim.
